meanings.definition: The act or process of covering a surface with tiles.
meanings.sent1: The tilings in the bathroom were done beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love the new tilings in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The tilings in the shower were so shiny, they almost blinded me!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in choosing the tilings for the floor was like painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tilings in the swimming pool made it look like a luxurious oasis.

meanings.definition: A surface covering made of tiles.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen floor had colorful tilings.
meanings.sent2: The tilings in the hallway were cracked and needed replacing.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally slipped on the slippery tilings in the bathroom.
meanings.sent4: The tilings on the roof protected the house from rain like a shield.
meanings.sent5: The tilings on the patio made it a cozy spot for morning coffee.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of tiles on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The intricate tilings on the mosaic floor were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The tilings on the wall formed a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: He tried to create a smiley face with the tilings on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The tilings on the ceiling resembled a starry night sky.
meanings.sent5: The tilings on the fireplace added a touch of elegance to the room.
